about_the_game:
Right now, the demo allows to experience mostly combat elements of the gameplay (as well as raising one's strength and mastering new abilities). Features:

  • Challenge 10 stages featuring unique opponents. Select a power-up each time you overcome a challenge.
  • Survival mode where you need to levels with randomized opponents. Acquire items, power-ups and abilities after each level.
  • Craft your own battle by selecting the enemies and the number of them that you wish to battle.

name: 3 Last Chances Demo
short_description: 3 Last Chances is an Action RPG game with challenging combat and progression system that allows to create your own unique playstyle. Fight through randomly generated encounters and try to survive as long as possible, or challenge 10 increasingly difficult stages.
